gmd:hierarchyLevelName.gco:CharacterString: SMAP L1A Radiometer Time-Ordered Parsed Telemetry

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: National Snow and Ice Data Center

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: SMAP L1A Radiometer Time-Ordered Parsed Telemetry

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: NASA National Snow and Ice Data Center Distributed Active Archive Center

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString:
Each Level-1A (L1A) granule incorporates all radiometer data downlinked from the Soil Moisture Active Passive (SMAP) spacecraft for one specific half orbit. The data are scaled instrument counts of the following:

  • The first four raw moments of the fullband channel for both vertical and horizontal polarizations
  • The complex cross-correlations of the fullband channel
  • The 16 subband channels for both vertical and horizontal polarizations

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: These data are offered free of charge. You may use these data freely, provided that you cite NSIDC DAAC as the source, and provide an acknowledgment in any published papers.

gmi:description.gco:CharacterString: Soil Moisture Active Passive is an American environmental research satellite. Part of the first tier of missions recommended for NASA by the Earth Science Decadal Survey, it is scheduled for launch in October 2014
